entry.div:
Casting
of
silver
Silver
needs a longish gate. For
gold
it does not matter.
Silver
, when soldering, tolerates the
water
one throws on it. But
gold
would spatter, &
needs that
for that reason, one casts
solder
bran
on the
solder
.
Let the
mold
cool well after the casting before opening it.
